sentences.en: The houses had much ornamental ironwork.
sentences.cn: 那些房子有很多铁制装饰.

sentences.en: The interior is also very impressive , with Gothic vaulted ceilings and ironwork.
sentences.cn: 我想这是我见过的最棒的火车站,更像一座皇宫.

sentences.en: The ornamental ironwork lends a touch of elegance to the house.
sentences.cn: 铁艺饰件为房子略添雅致.

trans.tran_cn: 铁制品，铁制部分，铁活，铁工活，锤铁
trans.tran_en: fences, gates etc made of iron bent into attractive shapes
